translations: n.苏克雷（玻利维亚首都）；苏克雷（拉美地区货币）

phrs.translation: 砂糖兔, 法国砂糖兔, 糖
苏克雷元帅, 新城区, 位于基多, 马里斯卡尔苏克雷
苏克雷元帅机场, 苏克雷元帅国际机场

sentences.sentence: Sucre seems to be hurting and Michael appears to be very dizzy.
sentences.translation: 苏克雷看上去伤还没好，而迈克似乎感到十分晕眩。

sentences.sentence: Outside, Sucre hears the jingle of keys as C.O. Stolte makes his rounds.
sentences.translation: 外面，苏克雷听到一阵钥匙的叮当声，狱警斯托尔特在巡逻。

sentences.sentence: Sucre rushes to finish smoothing the surface of the freshly poured concrete.
sentences.translation: Sucre 急于快点完成工作，把新浇筑的混凝土表面抹平。
